text_block_list.text: Why……why did things turn out like this?――
(Clack clack clack!!)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……! Jet Coaster……It's quite imposing in person.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: However, as one bearing the name "Invincible", I must overcome it! Now――To battle!
It was just a few hours ago――
Afternoon on a day off. As I was walking by the station, I spotted Yaeno Muteki standing in front of the information board.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Oh, if it isn't Trainer-dono. What a coincidence.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Right. In regards to my breaks recently, I've been reflecting on it a lot lately……and I made a quick decision. First I would head to town in order to forget about training.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: However, I am someone who is always immersed in martial arts. As embarrassing as it is, I'm unsure where to go.
In that case, perhaps a place made for everyone to enjoy. Maybe even someone like her could relax there.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I see, an amusement park……a sound idea. In a place like that, even I should be able to forget about my training.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Then――shall we proceed?
And so, that's why the two of us find ourselves at the amusement park, however……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Huuu, it was a splendid Jet Coaster.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Oh, well……of course it was. But that acceleration during the descent was a sight to behold.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Racetracks also have downhill slopes. I was aware of it, but I don't think I can handle them much better than I currently am……
I was only asking for her impressions, but Yaeno Muteki was deep in thought. At this rate, she'd start thinking about training again……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Eh――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: D-dark…… Trainer-dono! Where have you gone!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Hmm, my eyes are gradually adjusting……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: This is――

text_block_list.name: Ghost?
text_block_list.text: Eeeheeheehee! For those that set foot in this manor, escape is impossible……

text_block_list.name: Ghost?
text_block_list.text: We shall plunge you in to the depths of fear……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: What did you say……!?
choice_data_list: (Good, if it's a haunted mansion then……)

text_block_list.name: Ghost?
text_block_list.text: Uwaaah!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I'm not one that would be overwhelmed by just this level of darkness! Wicked fiend, perish the thought of waylaying Trainer-dono!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: And now, those hooligans have run away. Fufu……I won't let you escape!

text_block_list.name: Monster?
text_block_list.text: Baaaaaaa~! Eehiihii, were you scared?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Not by something of this level! Withstand this if you can, Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu Ultimate――!

text_block_list.name: Monster?
text_block_list.text: Ueeeeehh~!?!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: No, you should get behind me! Now is the time to purify this specter――!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……All is well. Without being led astray by those wicked fiends, it was a good opportunity to train a stalwart spirit――Ha!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: O-once again, I forcibly turned this in to training……I apologize! Even though you've gone so far for this, how unsightly……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: This was supposed to be training to discipline myself, I end up so caught up in the training that I forget all else. It's proof of my immaturity……!
choice_data_list: Then train to forget about training

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Eh……? H-however……to have you accompany me in this kind of light-hearted matter, it feels inexcusable……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Today, and during my recent breaks…… I feel like I'm always inconveniencing Trainer-dono.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: That's why, helping anymore than this…… I absolutely need to solve this on my own!
choice_data_list: No, I'll accompany you to the end

text_block_list.text: I say it firmly. This is the role of a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: However……!
choice_data_list: And a flustered Yaeno is interesting!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Ah…… Is…… that so……?
It seems like Yaeno Muteki was left speechless. We had a good time, so I decided we should head back to school for now……
The train ride on the way back. Yaeno Muteki, who was standing beside me, finally opened her mouth.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……is this really fine? Once again, I've exposed my shameful side……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: As immature as I am……I still wanted to be able to remain disciplined and devoted myself fully to my training.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: That's why, your instructions to 『Take a break from training』, I suppose I didn't truly understand it.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: And if that's the case…… …………

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……No. For now, I'll think on this myself.
After that, Yaeno Muteki remained silent.
Indeed……for Yaeno Muteki, who devoted herself to disciplining herself through training, this was probably a good opportunity to reevaluate her progress.
In that case, I had to help her. As summer approached, I'd have to keep this in mind.
